"A.P.241/12/26":
"<%me>!
We haven't spoken since that battle! I apologize for not coming to see you sooner!"
"It's a bit embarrassing, but I got a stern talking-to from the Commander and Deputy for rushing out alone... They ordered me to rest until I was fully recovered."
"Oh, but I'm fine now! I've always been quick to bounce back!"
"Thanks to you, the Hero Class has gotten a lot of attention."

"It's still growing, but everyone is working hard to help out.
...I'm truly grateful."
"It's thanks to you that I am where I am today."
"I hope I can continue to work together with you."
"Ooh, I can't do it! I'm just no good with touchy-feely stuff!"
"My body's recovered and I'm good to go, so why don't we take on a mission together sometime? If you don't mind."
"Please teach me everything you can about being a real Hero!"
